room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: We had a group of 6, did 2 rooms, and loved it!!!! Can't recommend it enough

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Survived the area 405 room. Staff was not the friendliest but we will be back for the fun of the challenge.

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: My husband and I had a great time! We didn't solve the room but we enjoyed it a lot. The staff is friendly and the rooms are cleverly designed. We will be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: I went as part of a team building day with my coworkers. It was awesome! We laughed, we worked together, and we escaped our room in time! We even spent a long time in the parking lot afterwards going over the intricate details. What I loved was the great job they do setting the TONE. You can FEEL the ambience which makes all the difference. It was fun to see how each one of my coworkers approached the problems differently. We had a blast and learned a little more about each other in a fun environment. Definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Such a fun and unique way to spent time with friends and family. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Great place. Very fun for a group of people or even just two. The staff is nice. The room makes you think! If you're thinking about going, just do yourself a favor and go.

room_title: Escape room "Area 405" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Man my group and I had so much fun! The staff was on point in character. The only thing was our room was perfect except for one clue that was ruined by the group in front of us. We had the code to get out but there was a flaw.not going to say what it was but the staff fixed it right away. Much respect and we will be coming back.
